website_summaries.verdict: This entry-level electronic board offers the same sticking as a bristle board without the sharp tips.
pros: Wide catch ring helps protect your wall from bad throws
Includes 6 soft-tip darts, 40 dart tips, adapter, and game manual
Can play by yourself or with others
cons: Display can break if you hit it
Consider putting a backboard behind the unit to protect your wall

customer_reviews.title: Turn your extra room into a Game room! Look at all the games!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome! 21 games and 65 variations will keep you from ever getting bored! Lightweight machine makes it easy to hang up. Plug it in with the enclosed adapter (see photo) or use batteries..Comes with 6 darts (pictured) and 40 dart tips. My suggestion would be to buy some extra dart tips as you will need them. Tip always break and have plenty of extras on hand so you can play interrupted. You'll want to with all those games! Get the boys to come over instead of going out! Save money. Have fun! Kudos!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Szymanski

customer_reviews.title: Great for everyone!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband and I to play. It has many games but we like 301 (I believe). It keeps track of multi players and I love that it plugs in and it comes with the darts. Works great and we have a lot of fun with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to the bachelor pad!
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to the bachelor pad! I bought this bad boy for our bachelor pad. We have a giant room we plan to dedicate to a pool table and this dart board. We tested it out on a few games of cricket and I'm very pleased with the quality or this unit. All the darts stick well and are well balanced. The board registered every hit as it should, but some electronic dart boards lack in this department. We're super stoked to have this new addition to our game room and it's already been a ton of fun. I wish we had picked it up sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Squirrel Master

customer_reviews.title: Buy Plenty of Tips
customer_reviews.text: Since I've mounted this dartboard in my rec. room since the End of September I have gone through roughly 200 tips. This thing seems to have no give what so ever and tips break on the darts almost immediately. I took it off the wall and mounted a 1 inch piece of pink board behind the dartboard as to cushion the blow...to no avail, the board will just continue to break tips....I'm thinking this is a manufacturing issue and will return it if some kind of resolution can not be reached. Tried to work with seller and all they do is send endless mailings with out results...Stay away from this seller by all means!!
customer_reviews.author: Excalit

customer_reviews.title: Great for 1 player or with company
customer_reviews.text: I had a hard time picking a dart board to get my husband for fathers day. A lot of the reviews on several boards were very mixed and fairly negative for the less expensive ones. My husband love this board. It's easy to hand up. The darts tend to fall apart when they fall onto the floor but it's not s big deal to fish. My husband bought a separate pack of darts but they were way too heavy and did not stick on well, something to keep in mind. I do wish it had an option to lower the volume but over all it is great and great for the price. Great selection of games
customer_reviews.author: Kelly H.

customer_reviews.title: Grandson is Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This dartboard was delivered on October 24th, 2019, as a gift for our grandson (he is 18). He was thrilled and loved playing it (even though it eats batteries like it was candy). Now here we are and he is over visiting and all set to play darts with us. Well it is completely useless and does absolutely nothing. But of course the return date was November 23rd. So here we are with no game to play and didn't even last the full 3 months. Would be nice if Amazon or WIN-MAX had a better return policy than this or even a replacement one would be better than nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Albie A.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Soft Tip Dart Board
customer_reviews.text: I wrote a review previously and was critical of the customer service. I must give an up date here. The company was true to their word and provided excellent service sending new dart tips that worked much better with the board. For the most part the board is high quality and the electronics seem good. I ultimately opted for a traditional steel tip board and darts but not because there was anything wrong with this product. If you want a soft tip dart board I would recommend this one and their customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Hogriver

customer_reviews.title: Great for Parties
customer_reviews.text: We bought this hoping it would come in for New Years as we had a party and we were surprised when we got it on New Years Eve! We put this up under our patio along with our corn hole games, etc. This was the perfect addition to our party and kept people entertained for hours. I also loved that I was able to plug it into the wall instead of just running on batteries. This would make a great gift for someone who loves to play darts. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: lgraff68

customer_reviews.title: So much fun for the whole family!
customer_reviews.text: This has been a fun addition to family night! My kids enjoy it and we are so happy it has the soft tip darts so they can use it. We dont have to worry about the kids getting injured. It has 21 games and multiple player mode too. There is levels for beginners, intermediate, advanced, and professional. It scores automatically on the LCD display. It is electric but you can also use batteries with it. Its light weight and not heavy at all. The darts are easy to assemble. Its a great addition for anyone looking to add games to BBQs, camping, family night, and family reunions.
customer_reviews.author: Tino kalantzis

customer_reviews.title: We like it.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice board. One suggestion, to minimize the amount of bounce offs, secure the whole board to the wall. The less it moves the better the chance of the darts sticking. It's literally day and night the difference. I also read about the possibility of an errant dart striking the digital display screen and cracking it. I put a small piece of plexiglass (welders hood shield material) over the display for protection. Might not be the most attractive thing but it puts me at a little more ease.
customer_reviews.author: James M.

customer_reviews.title: What a waste of money!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my husband's birthday in April. We literally had this for less than a month and it is malfunctioning and won't keep score. I am hugely disappointed, as we enjoyed playing it for the few weeks we could. For the price, this dartboard should of been more well made and certainly last longer! We had planned to have family over to play and now I need to find another dart board to purchase. I think this company should refund my money completely. Don't waste your time on this dartboard!
customer_reviews.author: Nickell Suppe

customer_reviews.title: Great toy in the office...  set up in less than 5 min.
customer_reviews.text: In less than 5 min, I had this dart board up and was playing a game. Can be powered with cord or battery which is nice and on top of the parts for 6 darts, the set comes with lots of extra tips. The board is made well and the darts have no problem hitting the holes. I threw over a hundred darts and only 1 or 2 bounced off the board and those were user error and not the fault of the board. I am very happy with this purchase and anticipate lots of use around the office.
customer_reviews.author: PMO

customer_reviews.title: Reasonably priced
customer_reviews.text: Product is serving it's purpose but is only used occasionally at a recreation cabin. It isn't the highest quality and probably wouldn't survive in a high usage situation. After a lot of research it is reasonably priced for the quality of the product. We will see how long it lasts. A package of replacement dart tips was included with the purchase. Based upon our prior usage we thought they had sent a lifetime of tips. After several games and a number of broken tips it now appears that we will need to be ordering more pretty soon.
customer_reviews.author: StanR

customer_reviews.title: Dart board is 100% junk
customer_reviews.text: I have used over 10 different dart tips to get the darts to stick, even the ones supplies, and I am always picking my darts up off the floor. Then, I even sprayed the board with a silicon spray. Still don't stick. This board cannot do a double a double bulls-eye. It was a huge waste of money. I am going to just throw steel-tip darts at it. It is all it is good for.
customer_reviews.author: Average Joes Jim

customer_reviews.title: Bulls eye.  Not a Double bull
customer_reviews.text: Board works well. Sounds good. Only negative is a wish the the display had a backlight so you can read the scores easier. Mostly play cricket and it is hard to see. Not many bounce outs with darts. Good quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: Dart Board
customer_reviews.text: This dart board is excellent to give as a gift for any time of year. The board itself is made for soft-tipped darts and is pretty safe for kids to use as long as an adult around. The board itself is well made and I have been enjoying playing it at night with the people in my neighborhood. The LCD screen is on the bottom of the target so it’s convenient to see. I think this is well worth the money and I would absolutely buy it again as a gift! *in case you're wondering... I bought an extra set of darts from this same company to give with the gift!*
customer_reviews.author: Dido

customer_reviews.title: Simple basic board.
customer_reviews.text: Good for the price. Some darts bounce out but I notice it only happens with my shorter tips. Easy to use and the voice announcements are just right, easy to hear. Only downside but I knew this before buying is that the display screen is small and can only be read when pulling out your darts. It cannot be read from the throwing line.
customer_reviews.author: Lance

customer_reviews.title: What a fun dart board
customer_reviews.text: This was an excellent purchase and it's provided us with hours of fun. It can get a little glitchy and it is a pain to switch between games, but for the price it is a decent board. It has a nice array of games and it can be set up for different numbers of players. I personally love the voice action it offers when you hit targets.
customer_reviews.author: Mike S

customer_reviews.title: GREAT dart board
customer_reviews.text: GREAT dart board! I usually play on a bristle board but wanted this for my "man cave"... this works GREAT! Darts stick as if it was a bristle board, keeps score and not only htat, has a ton of games that you normally may not play. Quality and runs off of both battery and plugged in. GREAT BUY!
customer_reviews.author: dave danhi

customer_reviews.title: This board was a great selection!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, I love this board! First, it's light weight. We mounted it on our patio and needed only one bolt for the mortor. Next, I thought I knew sevaral dart games but this board has so many to choose from. It's been lots of fun trying the new ones. I like that it's both battery and electrically powered. Nice for camping trips. The darts are good but I would prefer a choice of smaller flights. These come with the large ones. Otherwise, I am completely satisfied!!
customer_reviews.author: Florida Girl

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: After 3 weeks of use it started to not work correctly. It will not register every dart thrown. The newest thing the board is doing is giving 2 points no matter what target you hit. If you really want to play on a regular basis, I would save the money and invest in a better board. This was not worth our money and now we will have to buy a new one. I contacted the seller and never heard anything from them.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun.
customer_reviews.text: Just what we wanted for the rainy days. Bought a black foam poster board from Michael's and also made a dart holder to complete the look. Sounds are good. It was a little pricey, but works well and is fun for the whole family.
customer_reviews.author: L P

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for kids and adults!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this as a gift for my 11 year old son for our play room but my husband and I are enjoying it even more! We love how easy it is because of the electronic scoring to play many different games
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely a horror to use. Prepare to push buttons more than throw darts Seller beware - they have been harassing me for years to remove my review. They’ve even gone so far as privately Messaging me on Facebook.
customer_reviews.author: Mum

customer_reviews.title: Super dart board, everything you need works well
customer_reviews.text: This came with a lot of extra tips flights and flight holders. Darts stick in well and the electronic scoring works great. Really good value, plug and play once you add three aa batteries or plug it in.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Rodesch

customer_reviews.title: This dart board is a great alternative when you can't go to bars because of COVID-19
customer_reviews.text: I love this dart board, its heavy duty, has led and plays with up to 8 people. With the bars closed due to COVID-19 this makes for a fun night with friends.
customer_reviews.author: Moe

customer_reviews.title: Fun Fun Fun
customer_reviews.text: This dart board is awesome, it has a lot of really cool features that make it really easy and competitive for game play. It comes with a few extra dart points, it's really easy to hang and a blast for kids and adults. Shipping was quick and packaging was nice.
customer_reviews.author: ShaunaRene

customer_reviews.title: FUN!
customer_reviews.text: We love this dartboard and have had nothing but great times playing with it. I have not had any issues with it detecting where the darts hit or having darts bounce off. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Jones

customer_reviews.title: Not very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: They give you ALOT of replacement tips and flies or tails whatever you call them, but the tips break easy and its hard to fit the back or flies on without breaking it and ruining it.
customer_reviews.author: Jared

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Have boughten this twice. It works great, but the darts are crap.
customer_reviews.author: LegendComp

customer_reviews.title: Love! Love! Love!
customer_reviews.text: We set it up in our garage and it's been our Happy Hour entertainment during this CoVid Quarantine times. Couldn't be happier with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Tacoma, WA

customer_reviews.title: Great dartboard for the money
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a moderately priced dartboard for our family get togethers. This one is great and easy to set up and play. The fact that you receive extra pieces for the dart tips and ends is an added bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Just Beachy

customer_reviews.title: Improving on Their Designs!
customer_reviews.text: The company is trying to improve on their dartboard. The sound and power or better on our replacement dartboard. Thank you for outstanding customer service
customer_reviews.author: jst2bzy

customer_reviews.title: FUN
customer_reviews.text: This is a great and fun product, especially for those first learning. The darts are soft tips so if you do miss the board, you will not put holes in your walls. Only negative thing about this product is two of my darts already broke.
customer_reviews.author: Larissa

customer_reviews.title: Very fun for the family and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: I love it, it’s very family friendly and easy to use. The instructions are very simple and it’s easy to set up anywhere in your house. Good for playing with your whole family, it takes away any danger having that having real darts would have. People who can’t get the darts to stick on the board are just bad at playing darts, so don’t let those comments throw you off. Have fun!
customer_reviews.author: Mau

customer_reviews.title: Good dart board for the money.  Works as you would expect it should!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this dart board based on reviews and the cost. It has worked very well and have no complaints at all. I have had it for about a year and have had no issues with it. I would buy this dart board again.
customer_reviews.author: Dorito

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the price. Easy to put on the wall. Worked great for the 5 games of cricket I have played.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Z

customer_reviews.title: Great board for the money
customer_reviews.text: The set actually came with 16 darts and a bunch of replacement tips. Great starter board And for teaching youngster's how to play darts
customer_reviews.author: christopher j denman

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy enough
customer_reviews.text: Manual instructions could be a little simpler. Wings on darts should be much tighter on the dart
customer_reviews.author: Dee Rod

customer_reviews.title: Great for all ages
customer_reviews.text: Great for kids and adults, so easy to use. Love that it is electronic and keeps score for you. Darts that came with it fall apart, but easy to replace
customer_reviews.author: Heather  Drader

customer_reviews.title: It quit working.
customer_reviews.text: This product is a piece of crap. For the money I paid for it and not even two months later it just stops working. I’m very displeased. LED backlight never worked. I will never buy from this maker again.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Baker

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Bought this dart board after the last two we bought broke right away. It has been the perfect buy.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Clark

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy board, fun games
customer_reviews.text: Had this same dart given to us many years ago and after it quit working we ordered a new one as we liked it so much. Have not tried most f the games on it as we like the one we play so much we never get around to checking out the others.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great customer care
customer_reviews.text: The seller responded to my complaint about the quality of the darts and sent me a replacement. The replacement is very good quality and works well. Happy with the product now!
customer_reviews.author: Isam

customer_reviews.title: Battery compartment is on the back...
customer_reviews.text: Battery compartment is on the back and the board has to be unscrewed from the wall to change the batteries...
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Not at all what was advertised. Hard to read and the sound was very poor
customer_reviews.author: Guardhouse

customer_reviews.title: Broke after maybe 3 games
customer_reviews.text: Dartboard broke after a few uses. The sound stopped working and there was no way to reset it. Luckily i have only had it for a week or 2 so it is being returned. Don’t trust this enough to get another as it broke so quickly.
customer_reviews.author: poorpilot

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and has volume control
customer_reviews.text: We love that you can turn the sound off! It’s very sturdy and has a TON of darts and spare tips.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole McCloud

customer_reviews.title: works good
customer_reviews.text: I had one just like it for years and it finally fell out so got the same thing
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Affordable fun for the family
customer_reviews.text: Well made. Lightweight. Enjoy having it and the numerous game options.
customer_reviews.author: bns1277

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and appears sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Have only used once but I think it will be a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Fisherman

customer_reviews.title: Points tracker doesnt work well
customer_reviews.text: The darts stick well, however the points tracker doesnt work well.
customer_reviews.author: Eagles eye

customer_reviews.title: Completely died - only used twice
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to use over labor day weekend and was only able to use it twice before it completely died. It will not turn on at all, whether it is plugged in or battery operated. For the cost of the product, I am very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Felicia M. Villela

customer_reviews.title: We love our board
customer_reviews.text: We love our board. Has worked great so far. We have probably played 30+ games on it. We have batteries in it for now till we get our outlet hooked up. I would order more darts and tips right away.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma Julie

customer_reviews.title: Like the extra holes to secure to the wall. 👍
customer_reviews.text: Put it in my man cave. Lots of fun on those nights when you and your buddies have some beers. Then it’s game on😁
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I recommend this product. Easy to set-up, so fun, worth the price
customer_reviews.author: Kelly McCully

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Out of 100 throws only 1 dart didn’t stick, but still gave me the points for the throw. I’d say that is quite good for a soft tip dart board. I would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: adam

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price! Has many preloaded games. I did however but different darts w/tips as the tips that come with it bend easy.
customer_reviews.author: Ab

customer_reviews.title: Good board for the house
customer_reviews.text: The board works well, easy to install. The flights that are included are poor quality and the darts are very light weight.
customer_reviews.author: Gage A. Hazeltine

customer_reviews.title: Wish the darts stuck better
customer_reviews.text: It’s a decent dart board but the darts often don’t stick and fall on the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: fun
customer_reviews.text: my boyfriend bought this to add something fun to our apartment. and it is very fun. lot a of different games to pick from and easy to figure out. fun alone or with others, even on teams. the speaker is very loud though. also beware soft tip darts DO leave holes in your walls still.
customer_reviews.author: Breanna Goodwin

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: Very well made. Darts have plastic tips and are durable enough to let the kids play. Shipping was fast and communications with the seller were awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun dartboard
customer_reviews.text: Ok product for fun could be cheaper money wise for the quality
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Herrod

customer_reviews.title: Nice board cheap darts
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Darts could be a little higher quality for the money paid
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy this one!
customer_reviews.text: One of the best finds in a long time! Buy this product and you will enjoy it!
customer_reviews.author: Heather K. James

customer_reviews.title: We are very happy
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the money. Excellent product. Glad we got this—great for the family.
customer_reviews.author: S James

customer_reviews.title: Everything you could want for a plastic dart board
customer_reviews.text: I'm still learning a lot of the games on this, which is awesome because it keeps the dart playing interesting. Overall I have had no problems with the board and have put it through plenty of use. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: was delivered on time
customer_reviews.text: Not very good quality. The audio feature broke the first month we were using it.
customer_reviews.author: wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces means I’ve got to spend more money!
customer_reviews.text: Dart board looks great but I only received five plastics shaft, which means I’ve got to spend even more money for another set of darts!
customer_reviews.author: pixelnate

customer_reviews.title: It was fun while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: Died after using it less than 10 times. Stopped registering darts or responding to buttons being pushed. Bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Montgomery

customer_reviews.title: Great bargain
customer_reviews.text: This is a great dart board for the price. Very light weight and has option to operate it using batteries making it very versatile. My son and I have epic matches most nights.
customer_reviews.author: ARdude

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Board is fun the flights were somewhat difficult to install
customer_reviews.author: TF

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, easy to mount and darts are easy ...
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, easy to mount and darts are easy to put together. Look forward to much playtime on this dartboard!
customer_reviews.author: beeflyonebee

customer_reviews.title: It’s sweet that a lot of extra replaced plastic heads of ...
customer_reviews.text: We played 501 points game. It's an interesting game during a small party with some friends. It’s sweet that a lot of extra replaced plastic heads of dart are free.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 6 weeks
customer_reviews.text: We loved this dartboard right up until the time we went to power it up to play and it’s dead. My online research says it’s probably a blown fuse in the board. Now I have to figure out how to contact the manufacturer to see how to get it replaced
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Shea

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: I had to send this one back, it wouldn’t score on the one or seven so I’m waiting on a replacement. It’s a great board and worth the money. Can’t wait to play!
customer_reviews.author: amber wentsch

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Love my dartboard! Easy to install! Easy peezy all the way around :)
customer_reviews.author: Libby S.

customer_reviews.title: Missing piece.
customer_reviews.text: Was missing one of the flight holders. Luckily I had a spare
customer_reviews.author: Joe T.

customer_reviews.title: Product arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: I love the board it works great. Disappointed that 1 of the darts came damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Awilli4life

customer_reviews.title: Nice board for the price
customer_reviews.text: Nice board, has many games with variations on each, many I had no idea existed! Good deal for the money.
customer_reviews.author: D. W. Ewings

customer_reviews.title: Overall great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: The darts that come with the dart board are awesome! Very heavy and great quality! Plenty of extra tips too!
customer_reviews.author: Janet H. Chandler

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: We love it and have had hours of fun - holding up well despite a few newbies throwing wild darts 🙂
customer_reviews.author: RaiHoney

customer_reviews.title: Defective dartboard
customer_reviews.text: Love playing darts but this product let me down, promised sound n LED scoring neither but neither one works
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a boys night!!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband. He was very happy with the game selection, and all of the extars.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: BRIGHT LCD DISPLAY
customer_reviews.text: This item is defective. The LCD did not light on the first one I ordered and does not work on the replacement sent. Waste of time and money.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: After 1 week of use the board started turning on and off randomly, endings games, and the darts break easily and don’t stick to the board get well.
customer_reviews.author: Madeline Lester

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: Excellent customer service! The first dart board I purchased didn't work so they immediately sent a new one that works great!
customer_reviews.author: Tina Allen

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Too quiet should be able to turn the sound up
customer_reviews.author: mammachrissy3

customer_reviews.title: It's entertaining.
customer_reviews.text: My grown kids and their friends have really enjoyed this dart board. Make sure to keep the manual because the games go by codes. The seller is five star!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sheila O

customer_reviews.title: Broke within 4 times using it
customer_reviews.text: I used it 3 times and it stopped working. I’m so disappointed with this purchase and I plan on returning it ASAP.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Simple
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted! Easy to mount and easy to select different games.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsi Swain

customer_reviews.title: Darts dont stick
customer_reviews.text: Tried a few types of darts and they don't stick.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Solid dartboard
customer_reviews.text: The darts stick, good solid design, and the board doesn't light up as expected. It's nice!
customer_reviews.author: HMH

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Darts do not stick well unless you throw them hard. Hard to see led screen.
customer_reviews.author: Brad W

customer_reviews.title: great value
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for a few months now...we play several times a week and it still works great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this dart board for my husband as a gift. We just put it up and started playing. It quit working after 2 games.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Sleezer

customer_reviews.title: Dart board
customer_reviews.text: We give this board a workout and it's never let us down👍
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Cole

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t score up to 8 people
customer_reviews.text: When they say 8 players they mean after 4 players it goes 2 teams of 2, 2 teams of 3 and then 2 teams of 4. Pretty misleading.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Sanderson

customer_reviews.title: Broken in 20 minutes
customer_reviews.text: Received my dart board today. Used it two times and the start button died. Very cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: sue wood

customer_reviews.title: Solid product but display is hard to read
customer_reviews.text: Display is not backlit so its hard to read the scores
customer_reviews.author: Jil

product_meta.title: WIN.MAX Electronic Dart Board Soft Tip Dartboard Set LCD Display with 12 Darts 100 Tips Power Adapter
feature_bullets: 🎁If you do not receive the darts, just contact us, we will sent it to you. 🎁21 EXCITING GAMES WITH 65 VARIATIONS - Game list: 301, 401, 501, 601, 701, 801, 901, Cricket, No-score cricket, Scram, Killer, Football, Bowling, Double down, High score, Shanghai, Golf, Shove a penny, Steeplechase, Nine dart century

🎁BRIGHT LCD DISPLAY - Do not stop playing to keep scores, all you need is to enjoy the game with an LCD display. The maximum number of individual players is limited to 4. This dartboard is capable of keeping score for team play: 2 teams of 2 (4 individuals), 2 teams of 3 (6 individuals) and then 2 teams of 4 (8 individuals)
🎁WIDE CATCH RING - Wide catch ring offers protection for your wall from errant throws
🎁AUTOMATIC SCORING/VOICE ANNOUNCER - No matter if you practice or just play for fun, this makes it live as if you were taking a fierce competition

🎁Unlike other darts sets, our bundle features beautifully crafted barrels with full grip texture which allows any finger placement rather than forcing a front or rear loaded grip, 12 Precision Cut Aluminum Shafts for maximum grip of flights + 20 rubber O-rings to prevent loosening, 24 Polypro Flights (Standard) for a stable flight path, Flight protector and Dart multi-use tool.
